name: Airlines Manager
storyline: Start the airline of your dreams from a wad of cash and build it up into a global shipping and passenger empire. You decide how to treat your passengers, either you can pamper them and charge a higher fee or be dirt cheap and offer zero services. It's all up to you in Airline Manager.
summary: Business simulation games are called Tycoon games. In this airline management game, you will manage the finances and business of an airline as its CEO.
